Directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the first seven ingredients; mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Coat a 10-in. fluted tube pan with nonstick cooking spray and dust with flour; add batter.

Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack to cool completely. dust with confectioners' sugar.
Ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix
1 (1.4 ounce) package sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix
